author: Megan Armstrong
title: Pirates Players Buy 400 Pizzas for Pittsburgh Hospital Workers Amid Coronavirus
description: The  Pittsburgh Pirates  are filling their free time with generosity.  The team announced Monday evening that Pirates players bought 400 pizzas and pasta for medical staff at Allegheny ...
content:
Justin K. Aller/Getty Images
The Pittsburgh Pirates are filling their free time with generosity.
The team announced Monday evening that Pirates players bought 400 pizzas and pasta for medical staff at Allegheny General Hospital in Pittsburgh:
Pirates@Pirat… [+1504 chars]
